warnings: WARNING Flammable. Keep away from fire or flame. For external use only • Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or redness develops and persists. • Keep out of reach of children. • In case of accidental ingestion, seek professional assistance or contact a Poison Control Center immediately.
dosage_administration: Directions • Place enough product in palm to cover hands and rub hands together briskly until dry. • Children under 6, use only under adult supervision. • Not recommended for infants.
indications: Use To help reduce bacteria and germs on the skin.
